en: Duval said that when it comes to personal data, Google and Apple are in the same boat  this data fuels Google's business model, which is essentially based on selling advertising, while Apple, despite claiming to protect its users privacy, receives an estimated 8 billion to 12 billion US dollars each year to pre-install Google search on iPhones and iPads.
swa: Duval anasema kwamba, linapokuja suala la taarifa binafsi za mtu, Google na Apple wana malengo yanayofanana  taarifa hizi zinapalilia mfumo wa kibiashara wa Google, ambao kimsingi unategemea  bilioni 8 hadi 12 kila mwaka kwa ajili ya kuweka kitumizi cha kuperuzi cha Google kwenye iPhones na iPads.
llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here's the translation of the Swahili sentence into English:

en: Kenyas COVID-19 vaccination rollout has been mired by allegations of bribery, line cutting and corruption that have left poor and elderly citizens waiting in long queues outside public hospitals even as the country grapples with a third wave of infections and deaths.

en: With the governments strong denial stance, Tanzanians are not allowed to release any COVID-19 data that the government has not verified, which means that ordinary citizens as well as journalists and medical professionals are barred from commenting on COVID-19 in digital spaces, or accessing information.

en: The denial has been so convincing that its now widely accepted by Tanzanians, including medical experts, who disregard basic safety measures like wearing face masks and social distancing.

en: Global Voices visited major hospitals such Muhimbili, the government referral hospital in Dar es Salaam, the cultural capital, as well as Benjamin Mkapa Hospital in Dodoma, the political capital, and witnessed very few measures taken to stop the spread of the coronavirus disease.

llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here is the translation of the Swahili sentence into English:

I hope that helps! Let me know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with.</s>

en: People are allowed to enter hospital premises without wearing masks, there are few working hygiene and washing facilities and those that do exist lack water or are broken, which was witnessed, for example, in the pregnant mothers clinic at Muhimbili.

en: In Tanzania, the right to be informed, and to access and disseminate information, is recognized in Articles 18(1) and 18(2) of the Constitution of the United Republic of Tanzania.

en: A need for a unified, pan-African technology that can track the spread and connect COVID-19 testing centers across the continent has led to the use of PanaBIOS, an African Union-backed biosurveillance technology.

"Pan-BIOS is running a program that uses an algorithm to calculate the distance between people who have been infected with a virus and those who have not been infected yet, in order to predict the spread of the virus until it reaches its final destination."

en: The slow, televised journey turned into a deadly battle between government authorities and opposition politicians over where Hachalu would be buried, and OMN interrupted its coverage as the hearse was forced to return to Addis Ababa.

en: A number of people were shot and killed by government security forces, but several news outlets including Voice of America and Addis Standard reported that angry mobs from the Oromo ethnic group attacked multiethnic, interfaith towns and cities in southeastern Oromia, targeting non-Oromo, non-Muslim families in the region.

Some people believe that the agreement is not genuine and that the government is just pretending to make concessions to the Oromo people."</s>

en: A fateful interview

en: When news of Hachalus assassination first hit, Oromo diaspora media outlets zeroed in on Hachalus fateful interview with OMN host Guyo Wariyo, that aired the week before Halachu was killed.
swa: Wakati taarifa kuhusu mauaji ya Hachalu ziliposikika tu, chanzo cha habari za Waoromo wa diaspora zilihusisha kifo chake na  mahojiano ya mwisho aliyoyafanya Hachalu na kituo cha runinga cha OMN yakiongozwa na Guyo Wariyo, na yalirushwa wiki moja kabla Hachalu hajauawa.

Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here's the translation of the Swahili sentence:

"The time has come to talk about the death of Hachalu, who was killed by the news of the return of Waoromo from the diaspora, which caused great shock among the people, especially those close to him, including Guyo Wariyo, and it is said that he died before Hachalu could respond."

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with.</s>

en: During the interview, Guyo repeatedly asked Hachalu provocative questions about his alleged sympathy for the ruling party, interrupting him multiple times to challenge his answers.
swa: Wakati wa mahojiano Gayo alirudia rudia kumuuliza Hachalu maswali ya mtego kuhusu yeye kukiunga mkono chama tawala na pia mara kwa mara alimkatiza alipokuwa akijibu.
llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here's the translation of the Swahili sentence:

"The time for Mahojiano Gayo has come to an end, and he will no longer answer questions about himself because he is tired of people asking him the same things over and over again."

I hope that helps! Let me know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with.</s>

en: Hachalu fiercely denied any sympathies with the ruling party, but also decried the deeply discordant and fractionalized Oromo political parties, demonstrating his staunch independence as a thinker and musician  a quality that made him a target for online abuse until the day of his murder.
swa: Hachalu alikataa kuunga chama tawala mkono lakini pia alikosoa  migogoro na utengano katika vyama vya siasa vya Oromo, akionesha uhuru wa mawazo kama mwanamuziki  hali ambayo ilimfanya kuwa mlengwa wa mashambulizi ya watu mtandaoni mpaka siku aliyouawa.
llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here's the translation of the Swahili sentence:

"The struggle for freedom is not limited to one group or party, but it also involves the wisdom and determination of the people, like the Oromo people who have fought for their rights and freedom for many years, and have finally achieved independence."

I hope that helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.</s>

en: At one point, however, Guyo asked Hachalu about the historical injustices allegedly committed against the Oromo people by Menelik II, Ethiopias 19th-century emperor who shaped modern Ethiopia.
swa: Hata hivyo, Guyo alimuuliza Hachalu kuhusu unyanyasaji wa kihistoria uliofanywa kwa watu wa Oromo na mfalme Menelik II aliyeijenga Ethiopia ya sasa.
llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here's the translation of the Swahili sentence:

"However, Mr. Hachalu spoke about the history of the Oromo people and King Menelik II who conquered Ethiopia at present."

I hope that helps! Let me know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with.</s>

en: Hachalu shocked some listeners when he answered that the horse seen immortalized in Meneliks equestrian statue in Addis Ababa belongs to an Oromo farmer called Sida Debelle, and that Menelik robbed that horse.
swa: Hachalu aliwashangaza wasikilizaji wengi aliposema kuwa farasi aliyepandwa na Menelik katika sanamu iliyopo huko Addis Ababa alikuwa mali ya mkulima wa ki-Oromo aliyeitwa Sida Debelle, na Menelik alimuiba farasi huyo.
llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here's the translation of the Swahili sentence:

"The famous singer Hachalu Ali Washangaza has been accused of stealing songs from Menelik in Addis Ababa, who is known for his Oromo music as Sida Debelle, and Menelik has filed a lawsuit against him."

I hope that helps! Let me know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with.</s>

en: This exchange attracted applause  and criticism  from commentators on Facebook and Twitter.

en: When Hachalu was killed one week later, many members of the Oromo diaspora community immediately speculated that Hachalus criticism of the Menelik II statue infuriated sympathizers of imperial Ethiopia, which may have led to his murder.

Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here's the translation of the Swahili sentence into English:

"The time has come for us to remember the greatness of Emperor Haile Selassie II, who united the Oromo people and brought peace to our country, so that we may learn from his example and work towards building a better future for ourselves and our nation."</s>

en: On social media, Oromo netizens focused obsessively on Hachalus Menelik-related remarks, which led many down a winding path to an insidious disinformation campaign.
swa: Katika mitandao ya kijamii wananchi waling'ang'ana na kile Hachalu alichokisema dhidi ya Menelik, na hili lilisababisha kuenea kwa uvumi wenye taarifa nyingi za uongo.

en: The rest of the interview contains other loaded issues of divisions and contradictions within the Oromo community.
swa: Sehemu nyingine ya mahojiano imebeba taarifa za mambo yanayohusu utengano na migogoro ndani ya jamii ya Waoromo.
llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! The Swahili sentence "Sehemu nyingine ya mahojiano imebeba taarifa za mambo yanayohusu utengano na migogoro ndani ya jamii ya Waoromo" can be translated to English as:

"A different section of the community has been experiencing difficulties with the spread of false information within the Waoromo community."

en: Throughout the interview, Guyo grilled Hachalu about the countrys ongoing political reforms, stoking anti-government sentiment with questions about Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed, himself an Oromo, and whether or not the government had met the demands of the Oromo people after the prime minister came to power in 2018.
swa: Katika mahojiano yote Guyo alimchimba sana Hachalu kuhusu mabadiliko ya kisiasa yanayoendelea nchini na kuhusu vuguvugu la kuipinga serikali kwa kuuliza swali kuhusu Waziri Mkuu Abiy Ahmed, ambaye ni Muoromo na kwamba kama serikali imeweza kutimiza matakwa ya watu wa Oromo tangu aingie madarakani mwaka 2018.
llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here is the translation of the Swahili sentence you provided:

"In the recent past, there have been allegations that the government has been mistreating the Oromo people, particularly since the death of Waziri Mkuu Abiy Ahmed in 2018."

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with.</s>

en: Hachalu reiterated his non-involvement in the rabid partisanship of Oromo politics but he did criticize those who question Abiys Oromo identity.
swa: Hachalu alirudia kusema kuwa hajihusishi na siasa za ovyo za Oromo lakini aliwakosoa wote wanaohukumu uzalendo wa Abiy.
llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! The Swahili sentence "Hachalu alirudia kusema kuwa hajihusishi na siasa za ovyo za Oromo lakini aliwakosoa wote wanaohukumu uzalendo wa Abiy" can be translated to English as:

"I am not able to speak about the current political situation in Oromo because it is sensitive and could cause harm, but I can talk about other things."

Please note that this translation is provided for informational purposes only and should not be considered an official or professional translation.</s>

en: He defended his position against top Oromo opposition leaders who sought an alliance with the Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF), a once-dominant party with historic ties to the now-defunct Ethiopian People's Revolutionary Front (the EPRDF).
swa: Aliilinda nafasi yake dhidi ya viongozi wakuu wa upinzani walioungana na Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF), ambacho kilishawahi kuwa na ukaribu na  chama kikuu chenye historia kubwa cha Ethiopian People's Revolutionary Front (the EPRDF).

en: In Egypt, for example, Christians and Muslims both believe that circumcision of girls prevents them from vice and makes them more attractive for future husbands; mothers fear that their daughters cant get married if they have not been cut, according to a report by Stop FGM Middle East, a campaign created in 2013 to raise awareness about FGM and whose aim is to get the message out that FGM exists not only in Africa, but also in many countries in the Middle East and Asia.

en: Armed bandits attacked a secondary school in Kaduna, northwestern Nigeria, on August 24, killing one person and kidnapping four students and a teacher, reports Nigerian online medium, SaharaReporters.

llama:

swa: Watu hao wakiwa na silaha walifika na kushambulia kijiji cha Damba-Kasaya katika serikali ya mtaa wa Chikun, jimbo la Kaduna mnamo saa 1.45 asubuhi wakiwa kwenye pikipiki na  iliripotiwa kuwa walimuua Benjamin Auta, ambaye ni mkulima, kulingana na taarifa ya gazeti la mtandaoni la Premium Times.

en: On the morning of 15 May, police arrested supreme court lawyer and writer Imtiaz Mahmud in a case filed in 2017 under the country's now-defunct Information and Communication Technology Act, in which a private citizen, Shafiqul Islam, alleged that one of Mahmood's Facebook posts had hurt religious sentiments and incited communal violence in Bangladesh's southeastern Chittagong region.
swa: Asubuhi ya tarehe 15 Mei, polisi walimkamata Mwanasheria wa mahakama kuu  na mwandishi  Imtiaz Mahmud chini ya kifungu cha  sheria ya 2017 ambayo haitumika kwa sasa, sheria ya Habari, Mawasiliano na Teknolojia ambapo, raia mmoja, Shafiqul Islam, alilalamika kuwa mija ya machapisho ya Mahmood huko Facebook yameumiza hisia zake za kiimani na yalichochea uhalifu katika ukanda wa Kusini Mashariki mwa mkoa Chittagong, Bangladesh .
llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here is the translation of the Swahili sentence into English:

* "ni" is a particle that indicates possession or association, so it can be translated as "of" or "with".
* "pamoja" means "together".

So the entire sentence "Picha ni pamoja" can be translated to English as "The picture is together".</s>

en: (ICANN), a global multi-stakeholder organization that coordinates Internet Domain Name System (DNS), Internet Protocol (IP) addresses and autonomous system numbers, instituted the Internationalized Domain Names (IDNs) that enable people to use domain names in local languages and scripts.

en: Ideally, they are formed using characters from different scripts, such as Arabic, Chinese, or Cyrillic.These are then encoded by the Unicode standard and used as allowed by relevant IDN protocols, a set of standards defined by the Internet Architecture Board (IAB), and its subsidiary groups; the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) and the Internet Research Task Force (IRTF).

en: Opposition to his rule is growing: According to a public opinion poll released in April 2019, an overall majority of Ugandans opposed a 2017 decision to remove the maximum age limit of 75 to run for president, which would allow the 74-year-old to run again in the 2021 elections.

en: The disruptions were ordered by Ugandas security agencies and the Uganda Communications Commission (UCC), which regulates the telecommunications sector, online publications, broadcasting (both radio and television), film industry, postal and courier services.

en: On February 18, 2016, MTN Uganda, a telecommunications service provider, issued a statement on Twitter confirming that UCC, the regulator had directed MTN to disable all social media and mobile money services due to a threat to public order and safety.
swa: Mnamo Februari 18, 2016, MTN Uganda, mtoa huduma ya mawasiliano ya simu na mtandao, ilitoa taarifa kwenye Twita ikithibitisha kwamba UCC, ilikuwa imeiagiza MTN kufunga huduma zote za mitandao ya kijamii na huduma za kutuma pesa kwa njia ya simu kwa sababu ya tishio la kiusalama kwa umma.

Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here's the translation of the Swahili sentence:

en: On March 17, in an official declaration during Supreme Court deliberations in which President Musevenis 2016 victory was challenged, the UCC executive director Godfrey Mutabazi explained that he received instructions from the Inspector General of Police, Kale Kayihura, to shut down social media networking sites and mobile money facilities owing to security concerns.
swa: Mnamo Machi 17, katika tamko rasmi wakati wa maamuzi ya Mahakama Kuu ambako ushindi wa Rais Museveni ulipingwa, mkurugenzi mtendaji wa UCC, Godfrey Mutabazi alielezea kwamba alipokea maagizo kutoka kwa Inspekta Jenerali wa Polisi, Kale Kayihura, kufunga tovuti za mitandao ya kijamii na huduma za kutuma pesa kwa njia ya simu kwa sababu za kiusalama.
llama:
I can assist you with that! The Swahili sentence "Mnamo Machi 17, katika tamko rasmi wakati wa maamuzi ya Mahakama Kuu ambako ushindi wa Rais Museveni ulipingwa, mkurugenzi mtendaji wa UCC, Godfrey Mutabazi alielezea kwamba alipokea maagizo kutoka kwa Inspekta Jenerali wa Polisi, Kale Kayihura, kufunga tovuti za mitandao ya kijamii na huduma za kutuma pesa kwa njia ya simu kwa sababu za kiusalama" translates to:

"On March 17th, during the official opening of the High Court session presided over by Chief Justice Museveni, Mr. Godfrey Mutabazi, the Director of Public Prosecutions at the Uganda Communications Commission (UCC), alleged that Inspector General of Police, Kale Kayihura, had ordered the blocking of social media platforms because of the increasing use of fake news and corruption."

Please note that this translation is provided for informational purposes only and may not be entirely accurate or up-to-date. Additionally, some words or phrases may have been omitted or modified for clarity or brevity.</s>

en: Human rights activists say that targeted shutdowns during election periods slow down communication, just when access to information and citizen expression are most needed.
swa: Wanaharakati wa haki za binadamu wanasema kwamba ufungwaji wa kimkakati wakati wa uchaguzi hupunguza kasi ya mawasiliano, wakati tu upatikanaji wa habari na usemi wa raia unahitajika sana.

en: Internet shutdowns limit people from communicating particular concerns that affect them, such as health, interaction with friends as well sharing of political views and opinions, Moses Owiny, the chief executive of the Center for Multilateral Affairs, an independent platform for policy analysis operating in Uganda and Tanzania, told Global Voices in an interview.
swa: Kufungwa kwa mtandao kunazuia watu kuzungumzia mambo fulani yanayowaathiri, kama vile afya, mwingiliano na marafiki na pia kubadilishana maoni ya kisiasa, Moses Owiny, afisa mkuu wa the Center for Multilateral Affairs, jukwaa huru la uchambuzi wa sera linalofanya shughuli nchini Uganda na Tanzania, aliiambia  Global Voices katika mahojiano.
llama:

en: According to Owiny, shutdowns primarily aim to stop dissent in politics based on perceived fear by the state that citizens views and concerns are likely to incite the public, an accusation he believes is unfounded and not grounded in reality but assumptions.

en: In the lead up to the 2006 elections, the UCC instructed ISPs to block access to the website of Radio Katwe for publishing malicious and false information against the ruling National Resistance Movement and its presidential candidate, according to a 2015 ICT policy briefing by Collaboration on International ICT Policy for East and Southern Africa (CIPESA).
swa: Kuelekea uchaguzi mkuu wa 2006, UCC iliagiza watoa huduma za mtandao (ISPs) kuzuia upatikanaji wa wavuti ya Radio Katwe kwa kuchapisha habari mbovu na za uongo dhidi ya chama tawala cha National Resistance Movement na mgombea wake wa urais, kwa mujibu wa chapisho la sera ya tehama la 2015 la Collaboration on International ICT Policy for East and Southern Africa (CIPESA).
llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here is the translation of the Swahili sentence into English:

"The study conducted in 2006 by UCC revealed that ISPs were not providing adequate services to customers due to the high cost of radio spectrum fees, which was a major challenge for the National Resistance Movement and other stakeholders, according to the findings of the 2015 report on collaboration between international ICT policy for East and Southern Africa (CIPESA)."</s>

swa: Mamlaka ya Uganda ilizuia upatikanaji wa matangazo ya kituo hicho cha redio na wavuti wa the Daily Monitor kwa kuchapisha matokeo huru ya uchaguzi.

"The Ugandan government has launched an investigation into allegations of corruption and mismanagement at the Redio and Wavuti radio stations owned by the Daily Monitor."

en: Wine currently faces criminal charges for annoying the president and if convicted, he would not be allowed to run.

en: According to Human Rights Watch, in 2018 authorities targeted six opposition members including Bobi Wine and Francis Zaake, ahead of the August 15 by-elections in Arua (northern Uganda).

Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here's the translation of the Swahili sentence:

en: Members of the police and military arrested the group along with 28 other people on August 13, 2018, and charged them with treason.

en: As the 2021 election approaches, Uganda authorities are very likely to continue to crack down on political dissent, including through social media shutdowns.
swa: Wakati uchaguzi wa 2021 unapokaribia, kuna uwezekano mkubwa kuwa utawala wa Uganda utaendeleza ukandamizaji wa wapinzani, ikiwa ni pamoja na kufunga mitandao ya kijamii.
llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here's the translation of the Swahili sentence:

"During the 2021 elections, there was a big challenge in Uganda where some people were accused of using fake IDs to vote, especially if they had the same name as someone else."

I hope that helps! Let me know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with.</s>

en: In fact, since the 2016 elections, there has been no change in the legal framework that allows the government to restrict the rights to freedom of expression and access to information online.
swa: Kwa kweli, tangu uchaguzi wa 2016, hakujakuwepo na mabadiliko katika mfumo wa kisheria ambao unaruhusu serikali kuzuia haki ya uhuru wa kujieleza na ufikiaji wa habari mtandaoni.
llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here's the translation of the Swahili sentence into English:

en: According to the 2016 State of Internet Freedom in Africa report,  the 2013 Communications Act gives UCC broad powers and functions under Section 5 that permits the communications regulator to monitor, inspect, license, supervise, control, and regulate communications services and to set standards, monitor, and enforce compliance relating to content.
swa: Kwa mujibu wa 2016 State of Internet Freedom in Africa report, Sheria ya Mawasiliano ya 2013 inaipa UCC nguvu zaidi na inafanya kazi chini ya kifungu cha 5 kinachoruhusu mdhibiti wa mawasiliano kufuatilia, kukagua, kutoa leseni, kusimamia, na kudhibiti huduma za mawasiliano na kuweka viwango, kufuatilia, na kutekeleza uzingatifu unaohusu taarifa.
llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here is the translation of the Swahili sentence into English:

According to the 2016 State of Internet Freedom in Africa report, the 2013 Cybercrimes Act has strengthened the capacity of law enforcement agencies to combat cybercrime by providing more effective tools for investigating, prosecuting, and sentencing cybercriminals, including those who engage in online fraud, hacking, spreading malware, and distributing child pornography, as well as those who provide services that facilitate these activities.</s>

en: At the request of the government, the UCC used this section to order ISPs to block access to social media and mobile money services during the 2016 elections.
swa: Kwa ombi la serikali, UCC ilitumia sehemu hii kuagiza watoa huduma za mtandao (ISPs) kuzuia ufikiaji wa mitandao ya kijamii na huduma za pesa kwa njia ya simu wakati wa uchaguzi wa 2016.

Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here's the translation of the Swahili sentence:

"With the government's permission, UCC will investigate the situation regarding internet service providers (ISPs) in order to address issues related to the high cost of mobile data and services during the 2016 financial year."

I hope that helps! Let me know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with.</s>

en: Owiny argues that the state is capable of shutting down the internet at any time deemed necessary: Where regime security and that of its citizens converges, and where regime security is threatened, the regime security and its survival will take precedent.
swa: Owiny anatoa hoja kwamba serikali ina uwezo wa kuzima mtandao wakati wowote ule inapoonekana kuna umuhimu huo: Pale ambapo usalama wa serikali na ule wa raia wake unaingiliana, na pale usalama wa serikali unapotishiwa, usalama wa serikali na uponaji wake utapewa kipaumbele.
llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here's the translation of the Swahili sentence into English:

"The government has the ability to print money when there is no money in circulation, but the government does not have the power to print money without a reason, and the government's money printing should not cause inflation."

I hope that helps! Let me know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with.</s>

en: At the moment, 19 master teachers and small core staff have gone without salaries for over three months as the school struggles to secure strong funding partnerships and explore sustainable funding models for a school.

en: While the archipelago is known as a tourist destination for its pristine beaches and luxury hotels, the majority of local people struggle with high unemployment even as poverty has slightly decreased, according to The World Bank.

en: The birthplace of legendary taarab singers Siti Binti Saad and Fatuma Binti Baraka, or Bi.

en: Kidude, Zanzibar is home to musical genres that emerged through cultural exchange and collaboration along the Swahili Coast for hundreds of years.
swa: Kidude, Zanzibar ni makazi ya mahadhi ya muziki ulioibuka kupitia mchanganyiko wa kiutamaduni na ushirikiano baina ya wa-Swahili wa Pwani kwa mamia ya miaka iliyopita.

Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here's the translation of the Swahili sentence into English:

"The musician from Zanzibar is famous for his unique style of playing traditional instruments with modern techniques, and has gained popularity among Swahili speakers in the coastal region over the past few years."

en: Today, students can learn traditional musical genres like taarab, ngoma and kidumbak, along with instruments like drums, qanun and oud, as gatekeepers  and interpreters  of culture and tradition.
swa: Leo, wanafunzi wanaweza kujifunza muziki wa asili kama taarab, ngoma na kidumbak, sambamba na vyombo vingine kama ngoma, qanun na oud, kama walinzi  na watafsiri  wa utamaduni na desturi.
llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here's the translation of the Swahili sentence:

"Students can learn traditional music such as taarab, ngoma, and kidumbak, which includes instruments like the qraqeb, oud, and percussion instruments like the djembe and shekere. Additionally, they can study the history and culture of these musical traditions."

en: Zanzibars Amina Omar Juma, a former DCMA student and current DCMA teacher, recently returned from a tour in South Africa with her critically acclaimed, Siti and the Band, known for fusing the roots by blending traditional taarab sounds with contemporary, layered rhythms.
swa: Mzanzibar Amina Omar Juma, mwanafunzi wa zamani wa DCMA na mwalimu wa sasa wa DCMA, hivi karibuni alirudi kutoka kwenye ziara nchini Afrika Kusini akiambatana na bendi yake iliyojipatia sifa Siti na Bendi Yake, inayofahamika kwa kuunganisha mizizi  kwa kuchanganya sauti za taarabu ya asili na sauti za mahadhi ya kisasa.
llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here is the translation of the Swahili sentence into English:

"Mr. Amina Omar Juma, a former student of DCMA and current teacher of DCMA, kindly allow me to introduce myself as a representative of the African South Institute, who has come to learn from your experience with the traditional music of Siti and Your Group, so that we may understand the importance of preserving the original melodies and rhythms of the past."

Please note that Swahili is a complex language with many nuances and variations, and there may be different ways to translate this sentence depending on the context and intended meaning.</s>

en: She and other band members, also former DCMA students, released their first full album, Fusing the Roots, in 2018, going on to perform at Sauti za Busara, East Africa's largest music festival, that same year.
swa: Pia, kwa ushirikiano na wanabendi wenzake, ambao nao ni wanafunzi wa zamani wa DCMA, alitoa alibamu ya kwanza iitwayo, Fusing the Roots, mwaka 2018, akiendelea kufanya maonesho kwenye  Sauti za Busara, tamasha kubwa zaidi la muziki kwenye ukanda wa Afrika Mashariki, mwaka huo huo.
llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here's the translation of the Swahili sentence into English:

"Please, with your permission and in collaboration with the students of the past DCMA generation, we would like to perform for the first time, Fusing the Roots, in 2018, at the Sauti za Busara festival, which is a big music event in East Africa."

I hope that helps! Let me know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with.</s>

en: Over 15,000 visitors have passed through the academys iconic building to enjoy live performances, workshops and classes and interact with passionate DCMA musicians who represent the future of Zanzibar culture and heritage, according to the DCMA.
swa: Zaidi ya wageni 15,000 wamewahi kupitia kwenye jengo la shule hiyo kufurahia maonesho mubashara, warsha na madarasa pamoja na kukutana na wanamuziki wa DCMA wanaowakilishia mustakabali wa utamaduni na urithi wa Zanzibar, kwa mujibu wa DCMA.
llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here's the translation of the Swahili sentence:

"More than 15,000 students have enrolled in this school year, with some studying for free, others paying fees, and still others learning through distance education, all under the supervision of the Ministry of Education and the Zanzibar Cultural and Arts Foundation, with the support of the DCMA."

I hope that helps! Let me know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with.</s>

en: Drawing from a complex history of Indian, Arab and African exchange, the school celebrates the influence of dhow countries, with inspiration from cultures that converged along the Indian Ocean and the Persian Gulf.
swa: Ikiwa na vionjo vya historia ya India, Urabuni na Afrika, shule hiyo inafurahia kuwa matokeo ya tamaduni za nchi mbalimbali, ikiwa na utamaduni uliunganishwa kwenye eneo lal Bahari ya Hindi na Ghuba ya Uajemi.
llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here's the translation of the Swahili sentence into English:

"If we study the history of India, Urabuni (Arab) and Africa, we will find that the cultural heritage of these countries is reflected in the Indian Ocean and the Gulf of Oman."

Please note that "Urabuni" is an Arabic word that refers to the Arab world or culture.</s>

en: The Omani Sultanate, a major maritime force from the 17th to 19th centuries, shifted its seat of power from Muscat to Zanzibar in 1840.
swa: Sultani wa Omani, mfalme maarufu wa kati ya karne ya 17 na 19, alihamia utawala wake kutoka Muscat kwenda Zanzibar mwaka 1840.
llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! The Swahili sentence "Sultani wa Omani, mfalme marefu wa kati ya karne ya 17 na 19, alihamia utawala wake kutoka Muscat kwenda Zanzibar mwaka 1840" can be translated to English as:

"The Sultan of Oman, the famous ruler of the coastal regions of 17 and 19, has sent a letter from Muscat to Zanzibar in the year 1840."

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with.</s>

en: From Stone Town, Omani kings oversaw elaborate systems of maritime trade, including cloves, gold, and textiles, powered by strong winds that set dhows  traditional Arab vessels  sailing across the Indian Ocean, from India to Oman to East Africa.
swa: Kutoka Mji Mkongwe, watawala wa Omani waliendesha biashara ya baharini, ikiwa ni pamoja na karafuu, dhahabu, nguo, wakitegemea safari za vyombo vilivyoongozwa na upepo kati ya kingo ya Bahari ya Hindi nchini India kwenda Oman na Afrika Mashariki.
llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here's the translation of the Swahili sentence:

"From Mji Mkongwe, the owner of the Omani business, who is traveling with his wife for the first time, together with their valuable possessions, including gold, cows, and other precious items, embarked on a long journey by sea to India via the port of Bahari ya Hindi in order to reach Oman and East Africa."

I hope that helps! Let me know if you have any further questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with.</s>

en: Young Zanzibaris recognize the importance of connecting with the past to determine their future and the music created today expresses that desire to bridge the old with the new.
swa: Vijana wa Zanzibar wanatambua umuhimu wa kuelewa historia yao ili kubaini ikiwa mustakabali wao na muziki wanaoutengeneza leo unaelezea matamanio ya kuweka daraja kati ya mambo ya kale na haya ya kisasa.
llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here's the translation of the Swahili sentence into English:

"The youth of Zanzibar are studying the history of their ancestors so that they can understand the present situation and the challenges they face, and so that they can use music to pass on the stories of their forefathers."

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with.</s>

en: DCMA students and teachers recently formed TaraJazz, a blend of traditional taarab and modern jazz.

llama:

I hope that helps! If you have any other questions or requests, please feel free to ask.</s>

en: Their violinist, Felician Mussa, 20, has only been studying the violin for 3.5 years; TaraJazz is one of the most sought-after bands on the islands, captured here by photographer Aline Coquelle:
swa: Mwanamuziki wake, Felician Mussa, 20, amekuwa akijifunza kupiga chombo cha muziki kinachoitwa violin kwa miaka mitatu na nusu; TaraJazz ni moja wapo ya bendi zinazotafutwa zaidi visiwani humo, hapa ikiwa imenaswa na mpiga picha Aline Coquelle:
llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here's the translation of the Swahili sentence into English:

en: The Swahili coast tells the story of epic cultural exchanges and the DCMA continues this tradition through its musical collaborations.
swa: Pwani ya wa-Swahili inaeleza simulizi ya mchanganyiko wa utamaduni na DCMA inaendeleza utamaduni huu kupitia ushirikiano wa kimuziki.
llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here's the translation of the Swahili sentence you provided:

"The Swahili coast is experiencing the challenges of modernization and DCMA is addressing these challenges by promoting sustainable development through music."

I hope that helps! Let me know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with.</s>

en: Every year, the school hosts an initiative called Swahili Encounters, matching well-known musicians hailing from Africa, the Middle East, Europe and North America with DCMA students to create original musical compositions within a week-long period.
swa: Kila mwaka, shule hiyo huandaa mradi unaoitwa  Swahili Encounters,  [Mkutano wa ki-Swahili] unaowakutanisha wanamuziki wanaofahamika kutoka Afrika, Mashariki ya Kati, Ulaya na Amerika ya Kaskazini na wanafunzi wa DCMA kwa minajili ya kutengeneza tungo halisi za muziki ndani ya kipindi cha juma moja.
llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here is the translation of the Swahili sentence you provided:

"Every year, the Swahili Encounters festival brings together musicians from Africa, particularly from East Africa, Southern Africa, and America, and students of DCMA to celebrate the diversity of music and dance."

I hope that helps! Let me know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with.</s>

en: At the end of the encounter, the newly-formed collaboration performs at Sauti za Busara, and many of these collaborations turn into life-time friendships that transcend the boundaries of language and culture, proving music is a universal language.
swa: Mwishoni mwa mkutano, timu mpya za wasanii waliokutanishwa hutakiwa kufanya onesho kwenye Sauti za Busara, na mara nyingi timu hizi huishi kuwa na urafiki unaodumu unaovuka mipaka ya lugha na utamaduni, na hivyo kuthibitisha kuwa muziki ni lugha ya dunia.
llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here's the translation of the Swahili sentence:

"The moonlight is shining brightly on the faces of these people who have gathered here tonight to listen to the music of Sauti za Busara, and yet their hearts are filled with sadness because they miss their friends who are far away, and so they sing songs of longing for their homeland."

I hope that helps! Let me know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with.</s>

en: As Zanzibars tourism sector rapidly grows, the DCMA believes that music plays an essential role in the celebration, preservation and promotion of Swahili culture, heritage and history.

en: Zanzibar is far more than its beaches and luxury hotels  its a place bursting with talent that stems from an extraordinary history of cultural connection and collaboration.

en: The trials were conducted under the auspices of the Institut National de Recherche Biomédicale (INRB), the DR Congo Ministry of Health and three medical humanitarian organizations: the Alliance for International Medical Action (ALIMA), the International Medical Corps (IMC) and Médecins Sans Frontières (MSF).

en: Muyembe-Tamfum has been researching Ebola since its first known outbreak in DR of Congo in 1976 when he became the first researcher to travel to the area of the first outbreak.
swa: Muyembe-Tamfum amekuwa akifanya tafiti zinazohusiana na ugonjwa wa Ebola tangu kuripotiwa kwa ugonjwa huu kwa mara ya kwanza nchini Congo ambapo  mwaka 1976 alikuwa  mtafiti wa kwanza  kuzuru eneo ambalo ugonjwa wa Ebola uripotiwa kwa mara ya kwanza.Nilitumia miongo minne ya maisha yangu kutafuta tiba kwa aajili ya kutibu ugonjwa wa Ebola.Kwa hiyo, haya ni mafanikio katika maisha yangu-Dr Jean-Jacques Muyembe, ambaye ni Mkurugenzi Mkuu wa Institut National de Recherche Biomedicale ya Jamhuri ya Kidemokrasia ya #Congo pamoja na wenzake wamegundua tiba mpya ya ugonjwa wa Ebola inayoweza kutibu dalili za ugonjwa huu katika muda wa masaa matatu tu.Nilitumia miongo minne ya maisha yangu kutafuta tiba kwa aajili ya kutibu ugonjwa wa Ebola.Kwa hiyo, haya ni mafanikio katika maisha yangu-
llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here is the translation of the Swahili sentence into English:

"I have been conducting research on the Ebola virus since its outbreak in 1976 in Congo, where it was the first outbreak. Through this experience, I have learned that the Ebola virus can cause severe illness and death, and that it is important to take precautions to prevent its spread. Therefore, I always prioritize my own safety when handling samples of the virus."

Please note that the word "Ebola" is not capitalized in Swahili, as it is not a proper noun. Also, the phrase "kuzuru eneo" means "since" or "from," so it could be translated as "since its outbreak" or "from its outbreak."</s>

en: This position was further corroborated by a 2017 study in which Hal Roberts, Brittany Seymour, Sands Alden Fish II, Emily Robinson and Ethan Zuckerman analyzed over 109,000 stories published in US mainstream/regional media and blogs between July to November 2014, with a focus on Ebola coverage.

en: Alejandro Donaire, a student who says he fled the country after participating in a peaceful protest, told Niú how difficult it was to feel part of a functioning society in a normal life, after spending so much time hiding, fleeing or protesting.
swa: Alejandro Donaire, mwanafunzi alisema kuwa alikimbia nchini baada ya kushiriki maandamano ya amani, aliiambia Niú jinsi ilivyo vigumu kujisikia kuwa sehemu ya jamii na maisha ya kawaida, baada ya kutumia muda mrefu kwa  kuishi kwa kujificha, kukimbia na kuandamana.
llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here's the translation of the Swahili sentence:
